title: New article
content:
Still slightly shocked by Man Utd’s performance against Wolves. 

Both with and without the ball. 

They pressed how they usually do (Wingers inside on oppo’s CBs) but didn’t release their full back to press the oppositions full back. It was so easy for Wolves to play out.

title: Pellow Case
content: This is the pellow case of the century that helps the other pellow cases.

title: What's up!
content:
Hello, We do need a central DB though.
We can use cache for when the user is offline, but that's like for later later. Do we have drafts capability? If you're writing and you mistakenly press/navigate back, would you lose your work?
